statements: SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, preference_rating FROM UserInteractions WHERE preference_rating > 3;
SELECT interaction_time, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, ar_object_id FROM UserInteractions WHERE ar_object_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE ar_object_id = 456 AND preference_rating > 3;
SELECT distinct(interaction_type) FROM UserInteractions WHERE preference_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY preference_rating ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(ar_object_id) AS num_interactions FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_interactions > 5;
SELECT user_id, AVG(preference_rating) AS avg_rating FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_date, interaction_time FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_time ASC;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Like';
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_type = 'Language';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_time FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC, interaction_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, interaction_type FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_type LIKE '%color%';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM user_interactions INNER JOIN user_preferences ON user_interactions.user_id = user_preferences.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT environment_name, environment_description FROM ar_learning_environment ORDER BY environment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_type = 'notification';
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id, preference_type;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_type = 'color' ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT environment_name, environment_description FROM ar_learning_environment WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%click%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, email, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_details FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_key = 'theme' AND preference_value = 'dark';
SELECT user_id, learning_topic FROM ar_learning_data WHERE learning_session_id = 50 AND learning_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, preferred_language, preferred_theme FROM UserPreferences WHERE preferred_language = 'English';
SELECT * FROM ARActivities WHERE activity_name LIKE '%tutorial%' AND created_by = 'a9f805e6-54d0-4e2a-a15a-1d2f5c9d0853';
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = '73f82a88-f135-4ac6-884b-704f5ca1f84c';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;

SELECT user_id, activity_id, log_timestamp FROM UserActivityLog JOIN ARActivities ON UserActivityLog.activity_id = ARActivities.activity_id WHERE ARActivities.created_by = '3d1b15e1-9c66-4137-8faa-0b43bc6193ce';
SELECT activity_id, activity_name FROM ARActivities WHERE activity_description LIKE '%fun%';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE preferred_theme = 'dark' OR preferred_language = 'French';
